ruleset.name: Error Prone
ruleset.description: Rules to detect constructs that are either broken, extremely confusing or prone to runtime errors.

rule.name: TO_DATE_TO_CHAR
rule.description: TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(date-variable)) used to remove time component - use TRUNC(date-variable)

rule.name: TO_DATEWithoutDateFormat
rule.description: TO_DATE without date format- use TO_DATE(expression, date-format)

rule.name: TO_TIMESTAMPWithoutDateFormat
rule.description: TO_TIMESTAMP without date format- use TO_TIMESTAMP(expression, date-format)
